page.title: 08LOCAL EVENTS
page.content:
Local Events
On Thursday 5th July 1985 we had a Victorian Musical Hall.The School did some songs and a short Melodrama. We had a Carnival day with a float Parade all Victorian, like a Victorian Parlour and a School room and Sturton Traders.On 7th July there was an open air service taken by Revend.A.Butt.On the 13th July we have a sports day and a tea in the Village Hall.We have a egg and spoon race you put a ball on a spoon and run if you drop it you put it back on and run the winner is the first to cross the finishing line.On the last Sunday in September we have our harvest Festavel.The School children take harvest gifts to the church. Some gifts go to the Cheshire Homes in Retford.
